scripts.lint:links: find . -name '*.md' -o -name '*.mdx' | xargs -I {} node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const content = fs.readFileSync(process.argv[1], 'utf8'); const links = content.match(/\[.*?\]\((.*?)\)/g); if (links) { links.forEach(link => { const match = link.match(/\[.*?\]\((.*?)\)/); if (match) { const url = match[1]; if (url.startsWith('./') || url.startsWith('../')) { const path = require('path'); const fullPath = path.resolve(path.dirname(process.argv[1]), url); try { fs.accessSync(fullPath); } catch (e) { console.log('Broken link in ' + process.argv[1] + ': ' + url); } } }); }" {}
scripts.validate:content: npm run build && echo 'Content validation completed'
